justification: Misreads Team B’s incentives: calls Justin Wright a TE upgrade despite being Tier 5 and out. Minimal use of B’s stated preferences (deep-threats, injured buy-lows) beyond vague ‘young WR upside’; doesn’t note B’s urgent need for wins or that Eric Davis is doubtful. Trade also ignores Team A’s glaring TE need while adding a low-tier RB they don’t need. Feasible but strategically incoherent. Rationale is generic and partially incorrect.
